DOC.brief_summary: Collect PK/PD data for this age group to compare ADVAIR DISKUS with ADVAIR HFA
DOC.brief_title: A Study In Pediatric Subjects With Asthma Using ADVAIR HFA, ADVAIR HFA With Spacer, And ADVAIR DISKUS
DOC.detailed_description: A repeat-dose open label randomized incomplete block design in pediatric subjects with asthma, ages 4-11 years, to compare systemic exposure and pharmacodynamics of fluticasone propionate and salmeterol following ADVAIR HFA 45/21mcg(2 inhalations), ADVAIR HFA 45/21mcg(2 inhalations) with Aerochamber Plus Spacer and ADVAIR DISKUS 100/50 twice daily
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate, Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Subjects with mild asthma No significant medical conditions at screen Weigh at least 20 kg Exclusion criteria: No clinical abnormalities at screen visit Asthma control at least 3 months prior with antisteroidal medication only
